name: Elite Troop 2: The Enemy Now Is Another
description:
The events of Elite Squad 2 occur eight years after those of the first movie. One of its focuses is the maturation of then-Lieutenant Colonel Nascimento, character of Wagner Moura, who has to deal with problems with his teenage son. 
 The film also shows the growth of BOPE and conflicts between Rio de Janeiro police and militias. Director José Padilha stated that the film deals with the relationship between public security and campaign financing. 
 It links security with politics. In addition, a rebellion is held in the Bangu 1 penitentiary, led by Beirada, Seu Jorge's character.
